helpText.headline:
Set the heading of the accordion here.

If you leave this field blank, no heading will be displayed.
helpText.displayMode: Here you can choose how the accordion should be played out.
helpText.verticalAlign:
Here you can set how the vertical alignment of the element should be calculated in the storefront.

Tip:
If you place the accordion next to another, higher element, it usually looks nicer if the accordion is centered vertically.

entry.headline:
This is the clickable headline of the entry.

Tip:
This headline should encourage 'read more' as the content will not be visible until clicked.
